testsuite.title: OGC API - Maps Conformance Test Suite
testsuite.description: This executable test suite (ETS) verifies that an OGC API - Maps instance conforms to OGC API - Maps - Part 1: Core (OGC 20-058) and related standards. Conformance testing is a kind of 'black box' testing that examines externally visible characteristics or behaviors of the SUT and is independent of any implementation details.

testrunargument.name: iut
testrunargument.description: A URI that refers to the landing page of the SUT. Ampersand ('&') characters must be percent-encoded as '%26'.

testrunargument.name: mapFormat
testrunargument.description: The format of the map images to be tested. Default: image/png

testrunargument.name: crs
testrunargument.description: The coordinate reference system (CRS) to use for map requests. Default: EPSG:3857
